snippet: ABELS--Gusta (Zuckerman), 84, New York/Connecticut painter, died July 3rd. Beloved by her husband, Bob, daughters Margot and Julie, their spouses and children. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: ABELS--Gusta (Zuckerman), 84, New York/Connecticut painter, died July 3rd. Beloved by her husband, Bob, daughters Margot and Julie, their spouses and children. 1/3
